text: DM2 team I found that you can’t easily reorder field groups if they have more than 5 items inside of them because when you click and drag to move the group the screen wont scroll down
tried to use the chrome inspector to fake my screen being super tall vertically to work around this. didn’t work for some reason.
oh and there’s a bug with re-ordering too
<https://spin.d.pr/0zTuqR+> it thinks that I’m trying to nest a group but I’m not, I just want to re-order the groups so forms is below innovations
